header.title: AsyncAPI Conference 2025
header.subtitle: Join us for the AsyncAPI Conference, bringing the latest in AsyncAPI technology to locations worldwide!

about.title: AsyncAPI Conference
about.description1: The AsyncAPI Conference is an official event created by the AsyncAPI Initiative. This conference is aimed primarily at the community to share and exchange experiences between existing users and new members. We plan to integrate new members into the community and expand their knowledge about the project.
about.description2: We are currently looking for sponsors, for more details please read our Sponsorship Prospectus.

speakers.title: Meet The Speakers
speakers.description: Discover the inspiring voices shaping our event, each bringing unique insights and expertise to the forefront of their respective fields.
speakers.noSpeakers: We are actively accepting speaker applications, and you can start your journey by clicking the button below. Join us on stage and share your valuable insights with our enthusiastic audience!
speakers.noSpeakersFound: No speakers found for this location

tickets.title: Get Your Tickets
tickets.description: Secure your spot at the AsyncAPI Conference and join us for an unforgettable experience.
tickets.noTicketsAvailable: No tickets available at the moment

sponsors.title: Our Sponsors
sponsors.description: Elevating the future of APIs. Our valued partners and sponsors play a pivotal role in bringing our vision to life. With their support, we orchestrate an unforgettable celebration.

footer.description: The AsyncAPI Conference is an official event created by the AsyncAPI Initiative.
footer.madeWithLove: Made with ❤️ by AsyncAPI contributors. By the community for the community!

cfp.title: Submit your talk!
cfp.subtitle: We are actively accepting speaker applications, Fill up the form to apply as a speaker.
cfp.noTravelSupport: P.S. We do not offer travel scholarships or financial support.
cfp.successMessage: Your talk have been submitted successfully

popup.callToAction: Be a part of the journey as we build the future of event-driven APIs!
